title: Bloomberg Markets: Politics Could Make Fed Take it Easy
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Politics Could Make Fed Take it Easy
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jeffrey Cleveland Chief Economist Payden & Rygel Investment Counsel Discussing the impact of U.S. political news on Fed policy and if tighter financial conditions could lead to easing
